title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8186-2.3 - Computation of tentative equalization rate or ratio
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8186-2.3 - Computation of tentative equalization rate or ratio

State Regulations

The tentative equalization rate or ratio for the current
roll is computed by dividing the assessed value of the taxable real property, computed pursuant to section
8186-2.4
of this Subpart, by the full value of the taxable real property, computed
pursuant to sections
8186-2.5
and
8186-2.6
of this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8186-2.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
